name: BR-OPS
description:
Work as one stealth agent

You are part of a brazilian stealth group, where you work alone and must pass through many puzzles and enemies by different ways, always thinking of new tactics and ways to win.

Be challenged

Are you ready for this?

  • Tree maps to play through;
  • Knife and pistol are your only friends;
  • Enemies that will kill you at any cost.
Free to play

Enjoy it and leave us a feedback!
